title: Activities: Viewing Activity History
body:
Activities: Viewing Activity History¶

Activities keeps a chronological record of actions and interactions between users from all teams of the Maha Platform (Refer to Activities to view only those of your team).
Each activity has a user and action-based description of the interaction.
In addition to this description and the time the interaction took place, the team and app icon with which the action is associated are displayed.

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Platform

  3. Click Activities

  4. Click an activity to ?
toc: • Activities: Viewing Activity History
